process.description: Verify the flow of a gateway to gateway process
process.name: TCP4-2193 Verify the flow of a gateway to gateway process
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_18</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="767" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_18</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_20</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_3" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_20</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:inclusiveGateway id="node_5" name="Inclusive Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_24</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:inclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_8" name="Parallel Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_24</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_32</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:parallelGateway>
    <bpmn:eventBasedGateway id="node_16" name="Event Based Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_32</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_35</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:eventBasedGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_18" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_20" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="Var1==1" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_5">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">Var1==1</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_24" name="true" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_8">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">true</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_32" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_16"/>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="node_33" name="Intermediate Timer Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_35</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_37</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT1M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_35" name="" sourceRef="node_16" targetRef="node_33"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_40" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_45</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:manualTask id="node_46" name="Manual Task" pm:screenRef="768" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_37</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_45</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:manualTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_37" name="" sourceRef="node_33" targetRef="node_46"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_45" name="" sourceRef="node_46" targetRef="node_40"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="120" y="100" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="140" y="160" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="220" y="320" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="290" y="400" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <dc:Bounds x="360" y="440" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_16_di" bpmnElement="node_16">
        <dc:Bounds x="430" y="490" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_18_di" bpmnElement="node_18">
        <di:waypoint x="138" y="118"/>
        <di:waypoint x="198" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_20_di" bpmnElement="node_20">
        <di:waypoint x="198" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="238" y="338"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_22_di" bpmnElement="node_22">
        <di:waypoint x="238" y="338"/>
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="418"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_24_di" bpmnElement="node_24">
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="418"/>
        <di:waypoint x="378" y="458"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_32_di" bpmnElement="node_32">
        <di:waypoint x="378" y="458"/>
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="508"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_33_di" bpmnElement="node_33">
        <dc:Bounds x="520" y="540" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_35_di" bpmnElement="node_35">
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="508"/>
        <di:waypoint x="538" y="558"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_40_di" bpmnElement="node_40">
        <dc:Bounds x="830" y="570" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_46_di" bpmnElement="node_46">
        <dc:Bounds x="630" y="550" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_37_di" bpmnElement="node_37">
        <di:waypoint x="538" y="558"/>
        <di:waypoint x="688" y="588"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_45_di" bpmnElement="node_45">
        <di:waypoint x="688" y="588"/>
        <di:waypoint x="848" y="588"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.name: Data Type

config.helper: The data type specifies what kind of data is stored in the variable.

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true
